Description.Title: soil temperature model
Description.ExtendedDescription: Single-component soil temperature model computing a daily temperature profile at 1 cm resolution and mean temperature per user-defined layers. It derives the canopy temperature amplitude from daily min/max canopy temperatures, then updates each depth using an exponentially damped signal (based on fixed thermal diffusivity and diurnal frequency), a relaxation toward canopy temperature, and the effect of minimum air temperature; it also computes canopy mean temperature and updates previous state variables. Initialization sets the soil profile and canopy temperature to the first-day air temperature.
Description.ShortDescription: Calculates soil temperature profile and layer-mean temperatures and updates previous states.

Input.name: prev_temp_profile
Input.description: Previous soil temperature profile at 1 cm resolution

Input.name: temp_profile
Input.description: Current soil temperature profile at 1 cm resolution

Input.name: layer_thick_or_depth
Input.description: List of integers representing layer thicknesses or depths

Input.name: min_temp
Input.description: Current minimum temperature (generic argument to temp amplitude function)

Input.name: max_temp
Input.description: Current maximum temperature (generic argument to temp amplitude function)

Output.name: prev_temp_profile
Output.description: Updated previous soil temperature profile for next step

Output.name: prev_canopy_temp
Output.description: Updated previous canopy temperature for next step
